subSubSection.paragraph: Drosophila (Drosophila) arizonae Ruiz, Heed & Wasserman Figs 5 A-D

caption.paragraph: Figure 5. Drosophila arizonae Ruiz, Heed & Wasserman, 1990 ( repleta group, mulleri subgroup, mojavensis complex). Strain formerly E2.2 at NDSRC (later 15081-1271.4), from Navojoa, Sonora, Mexico, male terminalia (MZSP). A, epandrium, cerci, surstyli, hypandrium, aedeagus, paraphyses and aedeagal apodeme, oblique posterior view. B-D , aedeagus, paraphyses and aedeagal apodeme, three views. B, oblique dorsal. C, left lateral. D, ventral. Scale bar: 0.1 mm.
